description: This table contains a quarterly history of active product devices and trips for external organizations

schema.name: fiscal_year
schema.description: A code representing the fiscal year in which the 'date' resides (e.g., 'FY17')

schema.name: quarter
schema.description: A code representing the fiscal quarter in which the 'date' resides (e.g., 'Q4')

schema.name: product_id
schema.description: The internal ID of the Samsara product

schema.name: total_devices_heartbeats
schema.description: The total number of product devices that had an active heartbeat in the fiscal year quarter

schema.name: total_devices_trips
schema.description: The total number of product devices with at least one trip on in the fiscal year quarter
